attributes.action: Increase DNA and Genome research funding.
attributes.additional_details:
We request an urgent increase in Government spending on DNA and Genome research:

To determine the function of all sections of the Genome.
To relay this information to all interested parties.
To develop methods for assembling DNA.
To develop bio-computers utilising DNA and neural networks.
To use this research to safeguard the survival of the species.

Technical background information at:
http://www.startrek.com/boards-topic/33379452/captain-s-log-21-12-12?page=9
